column4: I have downloaded VLC to install offline... but when ever I run 'dpkg -i vlc_1.0.6-1ubuntu1.1_i386.deb' a bunch of error msg popup.... that I have to install someother libs.... is there a way 4 dpkg to install the libs auto?
but am not connected to the net
install vlc from repos, then install the .deb
you want challenging?  Diagnose a Windows Blue Screen of Death!  :)  Diagnosing Ubuntu is easy.
